theLastLightMod1:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theLastLightMod1:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theLastLightMod1:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theLastLightMod1:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theLastLightMod1:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theLastLightMod1:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theLastLightMod1:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theLastLightMod1:DefaultAttackWithVariab.NAME: Special Strike
theLastLightMod1:DefaultAttackWithVariab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theLastLightMod1:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theLastLightMod1:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theLastLightMod1:DefaultSecondMagicNumbe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theLastLightMod1:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
